en: Great is Jehovah, and greatly to be praised, In the city of our God, in his holy mountain.
hmr: LALPA chu a ropui a, nasataka inpâk ding a nih; Ei Pathien khawpuiah, a tlâng inthienga chun.

en: Beautiful in elevation, the joy of the whole earth, Is mount Zion, on the sides of the north, The city of the great King.
hmr: Insâng zâwnga mawitak, khawvêl po po hlimna chu, Zion tlâng chu a nih, hmar tieng panga, Lal ropuitak khawpui chu.

en: God hath made himself known in her palaces for a refuge.
hmr: A lal inahai chun Pathien chun kulbîng insâng a nizie ân hriettir a.

en: For, lo, the kings assembled themselves, They passed by together.
hmr: Ngai ta, lalhai chu an pung khâwm a, An fe tlâng tah a nih.

en: They saw it, then were they amazed; They were dismayed, they hasted away.
hmr: An hmuh a; chuongchun, mak an tih a, An lunginzîng a, an tlân hmang ta vak a.

en: Trembling took hold of them there, Pain, as of a woman in travail.
hmr: Chutaka chun inthinnain a man a, Nuhmei nau invawi natna angin a man bawk a.

en: With the east wind Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish.
hmr: Khawsak thliin, Tarsis lawnglienhai chu i suksiet a.

en: As we have heard, so have we seen In the city of Jehovah of hosts, in the city of our God: God will establish it for ever. [Selah
hmr: Sipaihai LALPA khawpuiah, ei Pathien khawpuia chun, Naa ei hriet ang ngeiin ei hmu tah; Pathienin chu khawpui chu kumkhuoa dingin sukdet a tih.

en: We have thought on thy lovingkindness, O God, In the midst of thy temple.
hmr: Aw Pathien, i biekin sûng rila chun, I ngilneizie hi kan ngaituo tah.

en: As is thy name, O God, So is thy praise unto the ends of the earth: Thy right hand is full of righteousness.
hmr: Aw Pathien, i hming ang ngeiin, Nangma inpâkna chu kâwlkaw- dawng chenin a um a; I kut changtieng chu felnain a sip a nih.

en: Let mount Zion be glad, Let the daughters of Judah rejoice, Because of thy judgments.
hmr: I rorêlhai leiin, Zion tlâng chu lâwmtakin um sienla, Juda naunuhai chu hlimtakin um raw se.

en: Walk about Zion, and go round about her; Number the towers thereof;
hmr: Zion chu vêlin fe huol unla, A râlvêng in insânghai khawm chu tiem ro.

en: Mark ye well her bulwarks; Consider her palaces: That ye may tell it to the generation following.
hmr: A kulhai chu inchik ngun unla, A lal inhai chu ngaituo ro; Ruolthar hung um nâwkhai kuoma in hril theina dingin.

en: For this God is our God for ever and ever: He will be our guide even unto death.
hmr: Hi Pathien hi kumkhawtluonga ei Pathien a ni ding a ni sih a, Thi chen khawma a mi ṭhuoitu ning a tih.
